feature.label: ML2 Feature
feature.description: ML2 Editor is an Eclipse-based editor for model specification in ML2 (Multi-Level Modeling Language). In order to create models in ML2, create a file within any project within any project using ".ml2" as its format. For the first model created, a pop-up should appear asking to convert the project to a Xtext Nature. Select "yes" and start developing the model. Authors: Claudemir M. Fonseca
